game.title: Forgotten Treasure
game.objective: Locate and retrieve the lost treasure chest
game.description: The legendary pirate Blackbeard has hidden a treasure chest on a mysterious island. Find the chest and retrieve the hidden treasure.
game.reward: 5000 Gold coins and Legendary Pirate Sword

task.description: The first step is to locate the old treasure map hidden in the Cave of Echoes.
The map contains a riddle which leads to the exact location of the treasure chest. Solve it to proceed further.
After solving the riddle, it's time to dig the lost chest. Be careful, you might face unexpected dangers!
